author: The Current
description:
Jackie Uhas of Porch Light celebrates the magic of song arranging
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

Porch Light’s Jackie Uhas has an uncanny natural talent for singing and songwriting. The Minneapolis band has already gained a massive Nationwide following in its first year of existence. Porch Light's standout single “Honey” features angelic, bare-emotions pop singing with indie rock sonics. Hear it station-wide across The Current, including Sunday nights on The Local Show. Hit Play!

@Porchlightband 

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/893TheCurrent?sub_confirmation=1  

Like/Follow:
https://www.facebook.com/TheCurrent/  
https://www.instagram.com/thecurrent/

This activity is made possible in part by the Minnesota Legacy Amendment's Arts & Cultural Heritage Fund.

#songwriting #minnesotamusic
title: Hit Play: Jackie Uhas of Porch Light talks about why the song "Honey" is special

author: The Current
description:
Watch Lucius recorded up close and onstage at the Palace Theatre
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

On Friday, May 9, Lucius were at the Palace Theatre in St. Paul as part of The Gold Rush Tour in support of their self-titled album, released just days earlier on May 2. After preparing the stage for their concert that evening, Lucius invited The Current to the Palace Theatre to record the band in an onstage, tech rehearsal setting. Watch these special performances above. 

Songs Performed
00:00:00 Do It All For You
00:04:52 Old Tape
00:11:05 Mad Love
All songs from Lucius’ 2025 self-titled album, available on @FantasyRecordings.

Musicians
Holly Laessig - vocals
Jess Wolfe - vocals
Peter Lalish - guitar 
Dan Molad - drums
Jacob Peters - guitar, bass

Credits
Band – @Luciusyt 
Executive Producer – David Safar
Video editor – Evan Clark
Audio engineer – Eric Xu Romani
Camera operators – Evan Clark, Ruben Schneiderman, Erik Stromstad
Graphics – N
title: Lucius give a special onstage performance at the Palace Theatre for The Current

author: The Current
description:
Lucius share their thoughts about lyrical and visual themes
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

On Friday, May 9, Lucius were at the Palace Theatre in St. Paul as part of The Gold Rush Tour in support of their self-titled album, released just days earlier on May 2. Holly Laessig and Jess Wolfe took time to talk about the album and about the band’s approach to stagecraft and visual presentation.

Lucius’ 2025 self-titled album is available on @FantasyRecordings.

Guests
Holly Laessig and Jess Wolfe of @Luciusyt 

Credits
Executive Producer – David Safar
Video editor – Evan Clark
Audio engineer – Eric Xu Romani
Camera operators – Evan Clark, Ruben Schneiderman, Erik Stromstad
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producers – Reed Fischer, Luke Taylor

#onstage #lucius #interview
title: Holly Laessig and Jess Wolfe of Lucius talk about self-titled album and more
